name: EVERYCOIN
description: $EveryCoin is more than just another token-it's a tribute to the entire memecoin movement. Built on the fast, low-cost Solana blockchain, $Every Coin is a collectible memecoin you can actually hold, designed to celebrate every coin that came before it. From the legends like Doge and Pepe to the wild newcomers shaking up the space, $EveryCoin brings together the full spectrum of meme culture into one unified project. It's not just a token-it's a community, a collectible, and a celebration of meme history.
